name: Eyes Open
blurb: A 2D horror stealth game in which you must fight off insanity by closing your eyes.

rewards.reward: ============================= KICKSTART CONNOISSEUR  ============================= \r\nOur sincere thanks for supporting our project.
============================= SPECIAL RECOGNITION ============================= \r\nOur sincere thanks and your name in a special backer section on our website.

============================= FAST BACKER ============================= For people that like deals, have a DRM free version of the game upon release.
 ============================= 
Full List : Final game, name in credits, name on website.
============================= The game will be delivered when it's done, which may be sooner than December 2014 or later.  If the game is ported to other platforms (Mac, Linux), you'll be able to choose your desired platform.

============================= TO THE POINT ============================= \r\nFor people who fund games primarily to get games, have a DRM free version of the game upon release. ============================= Full List : Final game, name in credits, name on website.\r\n============================= Our release date is TBD. If the game is ported to other platforms (Mac, Linux), you'll be able to choose your desired platform.

============================= CONCEPTUAL =============================  
Looking for just a little bit more for your money?  We'll send you a digital booklet with illustrations of our monsters, environments, and other concept art.  If you like illustrations and art books, and want another perk above the base game, this is the tier for you.
============================= 
Full List : Digital art book, final game, name in credits, name on website.

============================= ART ENTHUSIAST =============================  \r\nFor people who think art is cool, you'll get a much expanded digital booklet filled with not only concept art in various stages of production, but annotations about the thought that went into the different styles, videos of the creation process, and even some source files. Plus, while you're waiting you can get access to Sarah's artist blog. If you're interested in the visual process behind designing a game, this is the tier for you.\r\n============================= Full List : Expanded/annotated artist notes, digital art book, final game, name in credits, name on website.

============================= POST COMMENTARY IS IN THE PAST =============================
We'll be documenting our journey every step of the way to make available sometime after the final game is released.  At this tier you'll get immediate access to most of our blog posts (anything we can show you that's not too much of a spoiler) as we write them.  You'll be able to see our decisions pretty much at the same time we do and follow the game's development every single step of the way.  If you're interested in game design or the psychology of making a game, this is the tier for you.
=============================
Full List: Early access to blog posts, digital art book, final game, name in credits, name on website

============================= CREEPY LEVELS OF INTEREST ============================= \r\nFor backers that really want to watch the game unfold in real time, we'll give you access to all of our initial dev builds.  Until we run into spoiler territory, you'll be able to see the most up-to-date version of the game at any time, as well as access previous builds. ============================= \r\nFull List: Dev builds, digital art book, final game, name in credits, name on website

=============================  CONSOLIDATION ============================= Get access to any two of the 30 dollar tiers.  For people who are interested in combining rewards and maximizing what they get out of a Kickstarter project. ============================= Full List: Your choice of any two of the $35 tiers (annotated/expanded artist notes, immediate blog access, or livestream access), digital art book, final game, name in credits, name on website

============================= MAXIMIZATION ============================= Get access to any two of the 30 dollar tiers. For people who are interested in combining rewards and maximizing what they get out of a Kickstarter project. ============================= Full List: all three of the $35 tiers (annotated/expanded artist notes, immediate blog access, and livestream access), digital art book, final game, name in credits, name on website

============================= THE MEMENTO ============================= Get a collectable poster of the Eyes Open logo signed by our entire development team. ============================= Full List: Signed poster, all three of the $35 tiers (annotated/expanded artist notes, immediate blog access, and livestream access), annotated/expanded artist notes, digital art book, final game, name in credits, name on website

============================= THE COLLECTOR ============================= Each monster and environment starts out as an idea that is hand-drawn onto a standard piece of notebook paper.  Own one of of those sketches, signed by our entire development team, or left as is: your choice.  ============================= Full List: Physical concept art, signed poster, all three of the $35 tiers (annotated/expanded artist notes, immediate blog access, and livestream access), digital art book, final game, name in credits, name on website
